remarks: The multinomial formula for the ` N ` -th derivative of a finite product.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
dvnprod.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvnprod.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |`t S ) ) $.
dvnprod.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. Fin ) $.
dvnprod.h $e |- ( ( ph /\ t e. T ) -> ( H ` t ) : X --> CC ) $.
dvnprod.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
dvnprod.dvnh $e |- ( ( ph /\ t e. T /\ k e. ( 0 ... N ) ) -> ( ( S Dn ( H ` t ) ) ` k ) : X --> CC ) $.
dvnprod.f $e |- F = ( x e. X |-> prod_ t e. T ( ( H ` t ) ` x ) ) $.
dvnprod.c $e |- C = ( n e. NN0 |-> { c e. ( ( 0 ... n ) ^m T ) | sum_ t e. T ( c ` t ) = n } ) $.
dvnprod $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S Dn F ) ` N ) = ( x e. X |-> sum_ c e. ( C ` N ) ( ( ( ! ` N ) / prod_ t e. T ( ! ` ( c ` t ) ) ) x. prod_ t e. T ( ( ( S Dn ( H ` t ) ) ` ( c ` t ) ) ` x ) ) ) ) $.
$d C c $.
$d H c n t x $.
$d H k n t x $.
$d N c n t x $.
$d N k n t x $.
$d S c n t x $.
$d S k n t x $.
$d T c n t x $.
$d T k n t x $.
$d X k n t x $.
$d k n ph t x $.
$d k n t x $.
$d k n t x $.
